 1997-17051997-11-200,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  TC
PrecisOrder exempting the LAURENTIAN PILOTAGE AUTHORITY from the requirement to conduct the internal audit referred to in subsection 131(3) of the Financial Administration Act, on the grounds that the benefits derived from such audits do not justify the cost.
